channel.title: Error trying to run client
channel.description:
[Cache] Loading cache... [Cache] Loaded cache! [MapXTEA] Loaded 1502 map XTEA key(s) [PacketManager] Loading packet handlers... [PacketManager] Loaded 60 packet handlers. com.mysql.jdbc.CommunicationsException: Communications link failure due to under lying exception:
** BEGIN NESTED EXCEPTION **
java.net.ConnectException MESSAGE: Connection timed out: connect
STACKTRACE:
java.net.ConnectException: Connection timed out: connect at java.net.TwoStacksPlainSocketImpl.socketConnect(Native Method) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.doConnect(Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connectToAddress(Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.<init>(Unknown Source) at com.mysql.jdbc.StandardSocketFactory.connect(StandardSocketFactory.ja va:173) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.<init>(MysqlIO.java:267) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.createNewIO(Connection.java:2739) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.<init>(Connection.java:1553) at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDriver.java :266) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) at org.dementhium.mysql.DatabaseManager.establishConnection(DatabaseMana ger.java:44) at org.dementhium.mysql.impl.PlayerLoader.<init>(PlayerLoader.java:49) at org.dementhium.model.World.<init>(World.java:95) at org.dementhium.model.World.<clinit>(World.java:72) at org.dementhium.RS2ServerBootstrap.main(RS2ServerBootstrap.java:56)
** END NESTED EXCEPTION **
Last packet sent to the server was 47 ms ago. at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.createNewIO(Connection.java:2814) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.<init>(Connection.java:1553) at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDriver.java :266) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) at org.dementhium.mysql.DatabaseManager.establishConnection(DatabaseMana ger.java:44) at org.dementhium.mysql.impl.PlayerLoader.<init>(PlayerLoader.java:49) at org.dementhium.model.World.<init>(World.java:95) at org.dementhium.model.World.<clinit>(World.java:72) at org.dementhium.RS2ServerBootstrap.main(RS2ServerBootstrap.java:56) com.mysql.jdbc.CommunicationsException: Communications link failure due to under lying exception:
** BEGIN NESTED EXCEPTION **
java.net.ConnectException MESSAGE: Connection timed out: connect
STACKTRACE:
java.net.ConnectException: Connection timed out: connect at java.net.TwoStacksPlainSocketImpl.socketConnect(Native Method) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.doConnect(Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connectToAddress(Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.<init>(Unknown Source) at com.mysql.jdbc.StandardSocketFactory.connect(StandardSocketFactory.ja va:173) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.<init>(MysqlIO.java:267) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.createNewIO(Connection.java:2739) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.<init>(Connection.java:1553) at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDriver.java :266) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) at org.dementhium.mysql.DatabaseManager.establishConnection(DatabaseMana ger.java:44) at org.dementhium.mysql.impl.Highscores.<init>(Highscores.java:24) at org.dementhium.model.World.<init>(World.java:96) at org.dementhium.model.World.<clinit>(World.java:72) at org.dementhium.RS2ServerBootstrap.main(RS2ServerBootstrap.java:56)
** END NESTED EXCEPTION **
Last packet sent to the server was 0 ms ago. at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.createNewIO(Connection.java:2814) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.<init>(Connection.java:1553) at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDriver.java :266) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) at org.dementhium.mysql.DatabaseManager.establishConnection(DatabaseMana ger.java:44) at org.dementhium.mysql.impl.Highscores.<init>(Highscores.java:24) at org.dementhium.model.World.<init>(World.java:96) at org.dementhium.model.World.<clinit>(World.java:72) at org.dementhium.RS2ServerBootstrap.main(RS2ServerBootstrap.java:56) [World] Loading World... [ClanManager] Loading clans.... [ClanManager] Loaded 42 clans. [AreaManager] Loading areas... [AreaManager] Loaded 48 areas. [NPCDropLoader] Loading drops... [NPCDropLoader] Loaded 2649 drops [SpellContainer] Loading magic spells... [SpellContainer] Loaded 43 magic spell handlers. [SpecialAttackContainer] Loading special attacks... [SpecialAttackContainer] Loaded 37 special attacks. [DialogueManager] Loading dialogues... [DialogueManager] Loaded 35 dialogues. [DialogueManager] Loading NPC dialogue ids... [DialogueManager] Loaded 1 NPC dialogue ids. [ShopManager] Loaded 24 Shops [ObjectManager] Loading objects... [ObjectManager] Loaded 13 objects. [ItemDefinition] Loading item definitions... [ItemDefinition] Loaded 20430 item definitions. [RangeWeapon] Loading range weapon info... [RangeWeapon] Loaded 184 range weapon definitions. [Ammunition] Loading range ammunition info... [Ammunition] Loaded 219 ammunition definitions. [NPCDefinitionPacker] Packing NPC definitions. java.io.IOException: The system cannot find the path specified at java.io.WinNTFileSystem.createFileExclusively(Native Method) at java.io.File.createNewFile(Unknown Source) at org.dementhium.tools.converters.NPCDefinitionPacker.pack(NPCDefinitio nPacker.java:47) at org.dementhium.model.definition.NPCDefinition.init(NPCDefinition.java :43) at org.dementhium.model.World.load(World.java:127) at org.dementhium.RS2ServerBootstrap.main(RS2ServerBootstrap.java:56) [NPCDefinitionPacker] Packed 0 functional npc definitions. [NPCDefinition] Loading npc definitions... Exception in thread "main" java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Documents and Setti ngs\Owner\My Documents\sever\downloads\NDE\NPCDefinitions.bin\NDE\NPCDefinitions .bin\. (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.open(Native Method) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at org.dementhium.model.definition.NPCDefinition.init(NPCDefinition.java :48) at org.dementhium.model.World.load(World.java:127) at org.dementhium.RS2ServerBootstrap.main(RS2ServerBootstrap.java:56)
any1 have any idee how to fix>?
